import AlertWrapper from'./alert.style';/*
* ==================== Alert 組件說明 ====================
* Alert 組件封裝了 Material UI 的 Alert 組件
* ==================== Alert 可傳參數 ====================
* 1. state -> 共可接收 "error", "warning", "info", "success" 字串
*    此組件將根據上述 4 種不同狀態而產生不同的樣式色彩，預設為 "error"
* 2. children -> 顯示文字，不須設置 children 屬性，直接在標籤內部填寫文字
* */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Alert=function Alert(_ref){var state=_ref.state,children=_ref.children;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlertWrapper,{severity:state||'error',children:children});};export default Alert;
